tool.name: extract seqs by sample id
tool.description: Extract sequences based on the SampleID
tool.command:
extract_seqs_by_sample_id.py -i $input_fasta_fp -o $output_fasta_fp #if $negate: -n #end if
#if str($sample_ids): -s $sample_ids #end if
#if str($mapping_fp) != 'None': -m $mapping_fp #end if

param.label: -i/--input_fasta_fp: path to the input fasta file
param.name: input_fasta_fp

param.label: -n/--negate: negate the sample ID list (i.e., output sample ids not passed via -s) [default: False]
param.name: negate

param.label: -s/--sample_ids: comma-separated sample_ids to include in output fasta file (or exclude if --negate), or string describing mapping file states defining sample ids (mapping_fp must be provided for the latter)
param.name: sample_ids

tool.help: This script creates a fasta file which will contain only sequences that ARE associated with a set of sample IDs, OR all sequences that are NOT associated with a set of sample IDs (-n) The script produces a fasta file containing containing only the specified SampleIDs.
